alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 2:46AM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mobile, Baldwin, southwestern Escambia and northwestern Escambia Counties through 230 AM CST... At 144 AM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Citronelle to 4 miles southwest of Mobile Regional Airport to near Petit Bois Island. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Bay Minette, Atmore, Foley, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Robertsdale, Citronelle, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Loxley, Chunchula, Stockton, McCullough and Magnolia Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
